name: Square (itch) (Neyr)
description:
Hello. My name is Nyer. This is my first game. A 2D platformer, so original I know. 

The premise of the game is that you have the ability to flip gravity. Press X whilst having Energy to flip Gravity. Be careful, you might have to flip in the air as well. 

Another feature is that you can also use portals to teleport. Press C while standing in a portal to teleport. 

Press Z to Jump, Arrow keys to move.

IDK just look around, I hid little references around, sometimes behind fake blocks

Known Issues:

Your volume slider does not save

Movement on a floating platform is jittery

Level 9 - 16 literally don't exist
